faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our service.

items.label: Is this a secure service?
items.content: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security practices to protect your data.

items.label: How can I cancel my subscription?
items.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. No questions asked.

items.label: How does the free trial work?
items.content: Start with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

items.label: Can I switch plans later?
items.content: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

items.label: Do you offer refunds?
items.content: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with our service.

items.label: Do you offer support?
items.content: Yes, all plans include email support. Premium plans include priority support.
